title: Onigiri (Japanese Rice Ball)
ingredients: 2 cups cooked white rice, 1 tsp salt, 2 sheets nori (cut to size), filling (canned tuna with mayo, shredded grilled salmon, or umeboshi plum)
instructions:
1. Mix salt into warm rice evenly.
2. Prepare your filling.
3. Take some rice, flatten on plastic wrap, add filling in the center, cover with rice.
4. Shape rice into triangle or ball using plastic wrap.
5. Wrap partially with nori.
6. Serve.
